GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Heya, friend! <sp:5:0:0>You here to soak in the
hot springs? Excellent choice.<sp:0:4:0>Speaking of excellent choices...<sp:5:1:0> Do you
like <clr:0000>hard-boiled eggs<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Just toss a <clr:0000>bird egg<clr:ffff> in a hot spring,
wait a little while, and poof! A perfect
hard-boiled egg every time.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Those delicious gooey yolks are to die for.<sp:5:1:0>
Give it a try! The other patrons won't mind
a few eggs in the water.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Wondering where to get bird eggs?<sp:5:1:0> Well,
wonder no more! Because I sell 'em.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you drink an <clr:0000>elixir of boiled sticky frogs<clr:ffff>,
you'll hardly ever slipâ€”even in the
pouring rain!
They're a real must in this weather.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>It'd sure be handy if you knew someone
who sold sticky frogs...<sp:5:1:0> Oh, wait, that's
me! So how 'bout it?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're heading to Lanayru, you'd be
wise to bring <clr:0000>splash fruit<clr:ffff> as a <clr:0000>sludge
countermeasure<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And of course, if you're low on splash
fruit, I know a guy... <sp:5:0:0>The guy is me.
Buy my splash fruit.
GoRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hm? <sp:5:1:0>Friend, something tells me that you
may be Lanayru-bound.

Lanayru's home to a lot of caves, and
most of their walls are wet and slippery.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>If you want to make sure your climbing
<clr:0000>grip rarely slips<clr:ffff>, simply knock back an
<clr:0000>elixir made of boiled sticky frogs<clr:ffff>.
And as luck would have it...<sp:5:0:0>I sell sticky
frogs for all your elixiring needs! Care to
buy a few?
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Many thanks, friend! <sp:5:0:0>Is there anything
else you want to sell me?
GoRange_02_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you drink an <clr:0000>elixir made by boiling
sticky frogs<clr:ffff>, you'll <clr:0000>slip less<clr:ffff> on walls,
even when they're wet!
It's a travel essential if ever there
was one!<sp:0:4:0>Fresh out of sticky frogs to elixirize? <sp:5:0:0>
Never fear, my pack is here!
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>On lousy-weather days like these, I stock
special products to put some sun back in
your skies!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That was a real humdinger of a monster.
You really are amazing, friend!
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>I see... <sp:5:1:0>I got my hopes up too.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wow, I can't thank you enough! <sp:5:0:0>If you
weren't here, then... Well, let's not think
about that!
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Sell me as much as you'd like!
Com_Talk_06: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>There are no wrong choices at my shop!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there, friend. You on your way to
Goron City?

Ever since Death Mountain's eruptions
stopped, getting there is so easy, any
Hylian can make the trek.
Still, walking up that steep mountain road
can really take it out of you if you're not
adequately prepared.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>Buuut, <sp:5:0:0>if you drink an <clr:0000>elixir made with
restless crickets<clr:ffff>, you can <clr:0000>recover from
exhaustion right away<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And what a handy coincidence <sp:5:0:0>that I sell
restless crickets! So, what do you say?
Com_Talk_07: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh, wait, sorry...<sp:5:1:0> That's sold out for now.
Com_Talk_08: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You're a little short on rupees, there.<sp:5:1:0>
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Looks like your pouch is fuller than we
thought.<sp:5:1:0> Make a little space in there, and
come back soon!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>No matter how exhausted you get, one
drink of a <clr:0000>restless-cricket-filled elixir<clr:ffff> will
<clr:0000>perk you right up<clr:ffff>.
I never travel without it! <sp:5:1:0>Now, can I
interest you in some crickets?<sp:5:0:0>
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Why did this have to happen to me?
Run, friend! Run for your life!
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're pretty strong, friend!<sp:5:0:0> You remind
me of me back in the day.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Phew! Thanks to you, both my cart and I
got out of that intact.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello, hello, friend! Making your way to
Lanayru?<sp:5:0:0> Then tread carefully.<sp:0:4:0>Word is, these blackish clumps of <clr:0000>sludge<clr:ffff>
have been falling all over the region.<sp:0:4:0>It's really sticky and gross if the sludge
lands on you, but thankfully you can
<clr:0000>wash it off with water<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>In other words...<sp:5:1:0>everything will turn out
fine as long as you have a healthy supply
of <clr:0000>splash fruit<clr:ffff> on hand!
And if you don't have a healthy supply...<sp:5:0:0>
I sell splash fruit! Need to restock?
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Next time you hit the hot springs, try a
<clr:0000>hard-boiled egg<clr:ffff>. Just put a <clr:0000>bird egg <clr:ffff>in
the spring, and it'll cook while you soak.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And wow, it just so happens<sp:5:0:0> that I sell
bird eggs! You looking to stock up?
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0100>This is to show my gratitude. So take it!
Com_Talk_02d: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Got anything else for me to buy?
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>All my items come highly recommended.<sp:5:1:0>
By me! Take your time browsing.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0000>How many would you like to sell?
Com_Talk_11_c: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>That one has my seal of approval!
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I always say I can buy anything, but
you've found the exception...
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I can't buy the clothes off your back!
Get changed, and then we'll talk.
ShopGoodBye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you ever need anything, my door is
always open! Metaphorically, at least.
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm all sold out for the day thanks to you!
You're not just an eager customer but a
true friend!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I appreciate your business. Thanks to you,
I'm all sold out for the day!<sp:5:1:0>

I don't have anything left to sell, but
you're welcome to look at what I plan
on stocking!
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The rain always gets me down...<sp:0:4:0>The worst part is the slick surfaces.<sp:5:1:0>
A few drops of rain and I start slipping
and sliding off of walls.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>But there's a solution!<sp:5:1:0> <clr:0000>Boil some sticky
frogs into an elixir<clr:ffff>, take a swig, and just
like that, you'll start <clr:0000>slipping less<clr:ffff>.
Wherever will you find sticky frogs?<sp:5:0:0> Why,
right here, in my pack! So, how many can
I put you down for?
